price: 102.Nammey haytô baanta fiixsunta ayroy Qhiyaamah ayro kinni umeynitik intiita bulcinuk, foocitte keenik datuk, kobxissi ken hayneh soolô ballaaqâ fanah ken beyna too ayro.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ وَنَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ زُرۡقٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri wanaḥshuru al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin zur'qan
